description: This incredible lamb shank curry takes a little longer than takeaway but delivers on the flavour front.
name: Lamb Shank Curry Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Remove the shanks from the sauce and cover with foil. Place the casserole dish back on the heat and cook the liquid down until reduced and glossy, about 15 minutes. Serve with the lamb shanks.
